doc:
Maura Gale https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maura_Gale 0 Maura Gale (sometimes credited as Maula Gale) is an African-American actress who is best known for her voice role in Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty as Fortune. She has also voiced video games like Enter the Matrix, as well as the female voice of Guillo in the Gamecube RPG Baten Kaitos Origins. She also has recurring, guest star and/or Co star appearances in TV shows such as Saints and Sinners, Strong Medicine, NYPD Blue , and Ally McBeal, and in films Woman Thou Art Loosed , Their Eyes Were Watching God and ‘’Supreme Sanction. She hosts a weekly radio show and podcast, ‘’OMG Oh Maura Gale Radio Show’’ and is a Co producer, Co star and Co writer of the award winning docudramedy film STEM The Movement. Maura_Gale ( sometimes_credited as Maula_Gale ) is an_African-American_actress who is_best_known for her_voice_role in Metal_Gear_Solid_2 : Sons of Liberty as Fortune . She has_also_voiced video_games like Enter the_Matrix , as_well_as the_female_voice of Guillo in the_Gamecube_RPG_Baten_Kaitos_Origins . She also has_recurring , guest_star and/or Co_star_appearances in TV_shows such_as Saints_and_Sinners , Strong_Medicine , NYPD_Blue , and Ally_McBeal , and in films_Woman Thou Art_Loosed , Their_Eyes Were_Watching God and ‘’_Supreme_Sanction . She hosts a_weekly_radio_show_and_podcast , ‘’_OMG_Oh_Maura_Gale_Radio_Show ’’ and is a_Co_producer , Co_star_and_Co_writer of the_award winning docudramedy_film_STEM The_Movement .
